title: asterisk love.
content:
Hey ya'll.

I'm embarking on a project for which I need beautiful asterisks. Anyone have particular favorites?

Thanks,  
Helen
author: mtsthelen

comments.content:
I still like the asterisk I made for [Anivers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108205142/http:/www.josbuivenga.demon.nl/anivers.html).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108205142im_/http:/typophile.com/files/anivers_asterisk_6224.png)

Excellent.  
I've used Anivers many times, great work.

thanks :)  
Helen

This is the asterisk I design for Stanley.  
 [http://www.caketype.com/type/stanley/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108205142/http:/www.caketype.com/type/stanley/index.html "http://www.caketype.com/type/stanley/index.html")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108205142im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Stanley_4668.png)

Pieter
We had a fruitful discussion about [asterisks back here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108205142/http:/typophile.com/node/30176), though I'm not sure how helpful it would be in the current task.
